ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Official confirmation from Ester
ygData.msgSnippet: ... That s the only thing that has kept me here this long, my friends.  One by one they have silently dropped out or started playing once every 2-3 weeks now.
ygData.messageBody:
>However if my guild said "Hey Elf, we've decided to
>move the guild to xxxxxxxx (anarchy online, asheron's call, UO2, Diablo2,
>Icewind Dale, whatever)" I would leave in a second.

That's the only thing that has kept me here this long, my friends. One by
one they have silently dropped out or started playing once every 2-3 weeks
now. There are a couple of holdouts still, but I have not been able to hook
up with anyone in my guild for over a month. The one exception was when we
had a retirement party for our webmaster.

Kitasi
